description.translate: It is so robust that even the rock	bends under its will.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Pourfend-roche\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Elle est si robuste que même\"}","{\"text\":\"§7la roche ploie sous sa volonté.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7It is so robust that even the rock\"}","{\"text\":\"§7bends under its will.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7HAS§c-1 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
